p: The statistics of the study show a trend of an increasing number of dengue cases year by year ( Figure 1C). Most of the dengue cases occurred in the Pearl River Delta region of Guangzhou, Foshan, Zhongshan, Jiangmen, Shenzhen, and Zhuhai ( Figure 1B). In particular, the dengue cases in Guangzhou accounted for more than half of the total dengue cases in China between 2005 and 2018 ( Figure 1B).
